text: The 1999 Chinese Football Super Cup (Chinese: 1999年度中国足球超霸杯赛) was the 5th Chinese Football Super Cup, contested by Chinese Jia-A League 1999 and 1999 Chinese FA Cup double winners Shandong Luneng Taishan and Chinese Jia-A League 1999 runners-up Liaoning FC. Liaoning won their first title after winning 4–2.超霸杯：辽宁4比2战胜山东鲁能泰山超霸杯：4-2辽宁小虎力擒山东大汉 == Match details == {| width="100%" |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Wang Jun |- |CB ||3 || Wang Chao |- |CB ||4 || Hao Wei |- |CB ||5 || Shu Chang || || |- |DM ||2 || Shao Yanjie |- |DM ||15 || Fan Xuewei || || |- |RM ||8 || Li Xiaopeng |- |LM ||19 || Jiang Yong |- |AM ||16 || Gao Yao |- |FW ||9 || Casiano Delvalle |- |FW ||10 || Su Maozhen || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes used: |- |MF ||12 || Deng Cheng || || |- |FW ||20 || Song Yuming || || |- |DF ||21 || Tang Ming || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Slobodan Santrač |} |valign="top" width="45%"| {| style="font- size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK||1|| Fabrice Grange |- |CB||2|| Wang Gang |- |CB||4|| Qu Dong |- |CB||6|| Lü Gang |- |DM||5|| Xiao Zhanbo || || |- |DM||30|| Li Tie |- |RM||9|| Zhao Junzhe |- |LM||17|| Li Yao |- |AM||29|| Li Jinyu |- |FW||7|| Qu Leheng |- |FW||19|| Qu Shengqing |- |colspan=3|Substitutes used: |- |DF ||16 || Yuan Zhe || || |- |MF ||18 || Bai Guanghai || || |- |DF ||15 || Wang Liang || || |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Zhang Yin |} |- |} {| style="width:100%; font-size:90%;" | Man of the Match: Qu Leheng (Liaoning FC) Assistant referees: Liu Tiejun (Beijing) Zheng Weixiang (Guangzhou) Fourth official: Huang Junjie (Shanghai) |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto; width: 20%" |- !Chinese Football Super Cup 1999 Winners |- |Liaoning FC First title |} == References == Category:1999 in Chinese football 1999
